info.author: Andrea D'Este
info.description:
Description
===========

Policy product for Ploomcake

Changelog
=========

1.7 (2012-11-09)
----------------

- Deactivated tinymce contextual menu [sithmel]
- fix setuphandler (uncorrectly handling exceptions) issue #1 [sithmel]


1.6 (2012-10-04)
----------------

- Fix the number of versions in portal_purgepolicy from 0 to 4.
  0 used to make CMFEditions crash [sithmel]

1.4 (2012-09-17)
----------------

- fix remove comment permissions [sithmel]

1.3 (2012-07-27)
----------------

- pluggable cakes [sithmel]
- fix hiddenproducts [sithmel]

1.2 (2012-07-20)
----------------

- removed name attribute from search templates (better compatibility
  with xhtml strict) [sithmel]
- added redomino.protectdelete as dependency [sithmel]

1.1.7 (2012-07-16)
------------------

- fix on collaboration portal profile [adeste]
- wrong dependency on redomino.contentwellportlets [sithmel]
- fixed potential problem on languages installation [sithmel]


1.1 (2012-01-12)
----------------

- First internal release
info.name: ploomcake.core
info.html_description:
Description

Policy product for Ploomcake

Changelog

1.7 (2012-11-09)

  • Deactivated tinymce contextual menu [sithmel]
  • fix setuphandler (uncorrectly handling exceptions) issue #1 [sithmel]

1.6 (2012-10-04)

  • Fix the number of versions in portal_purgepolicy from 0 to 4. 0 used to make CMFEditions crash [sithmel]

1.4 (2012-09-17)

  • fix remove comment permissions [sithmel]

1.3 (2012-07-27)

  • pluggable cakes [sithmel]
  • fix hiddenproducts [sithmel]

1.2 (2012-07-20)

  • removed name attribute from search templates (better compatibility with xhtml strict) [sithmel]
  • added redomino.protectdelete as dependency [sithmel]

1.1.7 (2012-07-16)

  • fix on collaboration portal profile [adeste]
  • wrong dependency on redomino.contentwellportlets [sithmel]
  • fixed potential problem on languages installation [sithmel]

1.1 (2012-01-12)

  • First internal release
